entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Endgame2021 Trump. 

COVID19 is only as bad as it is here, because of Trump. We need a real leader to address this, along with the recession, income inequality, the climate, and a host of other very serious issues that will never be addressed while we have a corrupt Russian puppet in the WH.
